# outlineViewColumnDidResize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Invoked whenever the user resizes a column in the outline view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func outlineViewColumnDidResize(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: The posted notification.

## Discussion

This method is invoked as a result of posting an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSOutlineView/columnDidResizeNotification].

## Working with the Outline Column

- **outlineViewColumnDidMove(_:)**: Invoked whenever the user moves a column in the outline view.
- **outlineViewItemWillExpand(_:)**: Invoked when `notification` is posted—that is, whenever the user is about to expand an item in the outline view.
- **outlineViewItemDidExpand(_:)**: Invoked when `notification` is posted—that is, whenever the user expands an item in the outline view.
- **outlineViewItemWillCollapse(_:)**: Invoked when `notification` is posted—that is, whenever the user is about to collapse an item in the outline view.
- **outlineViewItemDidCollapse(_:)**: Invoked when the did collapse notification is posted—that is, whenever the user collapses an item in the outline view.
